title: # 473 - Whitney Cummings & ME
description:
Today, I sit down and have a few drinks with comedian Whitney Cummings. We talk about sex dolls, porn stars, edibles, cave diving, Chet Hanks, embarrassing dates, and Whitney Facetimes Dave Grohl, Ke$ha, Tom Segura, and Olivia Munn. 

Check out Whitney’s Podcast “Good For You” wherever you get yours! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Super Speciosa. Try kratom and get 20% off your entire order – go to http://www.GetSuperLeaf.com/Bert and use promo code BERT for 20% off.

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. Go to https://www.fiverr.com and use code “Bert” for 10% off your first order.

This episode is also brought to you by Stat Hero. Sign up for free at http://www.stathero.com/Bertcast and get a 300% match!

 

This episode is also brought to you by SkyLight Frames. Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go http://www.SkylightFrame.com and enter code “BERT”
